about.name: Sivanantham Sinthujan
about.role: Digital Product Designer & Web Developer in Training
bio: In 2010, I completed my training as a chef. From 2015 to 2024, I was self-employed. Searching for a new perspective, I found the retraining program at the Syntax Institute, which perfectly matched my passion for design and technology.

During the training as a Digital Product Designer, I learned topics such as color, typography, design principles, competitor & requirements analysis, wireframes, prototypes, animations, microinteractions, information architecture, personas, user flows, and project planning with Scrum. I also worked extensively with tools like Figma and Framer.

After successfully completing my IHK certification as a Digital Product Designer, I began an introduction to software and web development. I acquired skills in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, responsive design, JavaScript, API integration, version control (Git), and I am currently learning React, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, and backend development.
I love understanding how functional digital products are created from code and design â€“ clear, user-friendly, and with attention to detail.
